body.p: I beg you to accept my cordial thanks for your very obliging note and its accompanying volume of your adventures in South Africa.Adventures in the Far Interior of South Africa; Including a Journey to Lake Ngami, and Rambles in Honduras, London & Liverpool, 1866. I have a passion for books of travel, and it will not be long before I become closely acquainted with yours.
